title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to huge breaking news out of the NFL that Aaron Rodgers being placed in COVID-19 protocol after testing positive and not being vaccinated. He explains why this could work out in Rodgers' favor in the long run while also giving the Packers a golden opportunity to take a look at 1st round pick Jordan Love. He believes Odell Beckham Jr's time in Cleveland is coming to an end and why it's a reflection of today's NFL. Plus, founder of The Ringer Bill Simmons joins the show to explain why Rodgers deserves all the criticism he is receiving today. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
